ygData.subject: Re: A few general ramblings on attaining some SAFE coin...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, I personally just keep a backpack full of supplies in the bank in case I die. Relatively full suit of low-end patchwork/leather armor, a weapon, food
ygData.messageBody:
> The gold from the fish gave me enough to buy a sewing kit, and I
> ventured out to get some ruined cat pelts to replace my armour. A
> weapon was easily looted from a skeleton in the newbie area.

Hmm, I personally just keep a backpack full of supplies in the bank in
case I die. Relatively full suit of low-end patchwork/leather armor, a
weapon, food and water. Does the job. =) It was filled out as I upgraded
to banded equipment. The majority of the time I don't even need it as I
don't travel very far, but I'm sure it'll come in handy at some point.

---
